findings.title: ST - Stop Transactions
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop transactions for all users excluding the owner.

findings.title: ELFM - Exceed Limit Fees Manipulation
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to increase over the allowed limit of 25%.

findings.title: STC - Succeeded Transfer Check
findings.description: According to the ERC20 specification, the transfer methods should be checked if the result is successful.

findings.title: FSA - Fixed Swap Address
findings.description: The swap address is assigned once in the constructor and it cannot be changed.

findings.title: L01 - Public Function could be Declared External
findings.description: Public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas.

findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: Constant state variables should be declared constant to save gas.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: Solidity defines a naming convention that should be followed.

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: Detected missing events for critical arithmetic parameters.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Functions that are not used in the contract, and make the code's size bigger.

findings.title: L11 - Unnecessary Boolean equality
findings.description: The comparison to boolean constants is redundant.

findings.title: Centralization of Ownership
findings.description: The contract owner has excessive control over critical functions, potentially leading to manipulation and abuse.
findings.location: Milesinu contract, specifically the Owner role

findings.title: Temporary Locking of Contract
findings.description: The contract can be temporarily locked or ownership renounced, which could lead to unintended consequences.
findings.location: Milesinu contract, specifically the lock and renounceOwnership functions
